pages.text: Ravens are a species of birds, often noted for the striking black of their feathers.

They are extremely perceptive and intelligent, and witches of similar ability often seek a raven as a companion. Some ravens are even capable of mimicking speech, though they are not reliable messengers.$(2br)Sometimes mistaken as a sign of bad luck, ravens really precede the approach of power and plenty.
